attributes.action: Stop a victims underwear being evidence in a rape cases.
attributes.background: A 27 year old man in Cork, Ireland was acquitted of rape charges after his defense lawyers suggested the jurors take into consideration the underwear the victim was wearing on the night. He was found not guilty.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for the law in Ireland.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/227191
